description:
An anime project based off of the Assault Lily doll series.

On Earth in the near future, humanity faced imminent destruction from mysterious giant creatures known as "Huge." The entire world unites against the Huge, and successfully develops weaponry known as "CHARM" (Counter Huge Arms) by combining science and magic. CHARM exhibits high rates of synchronization with teenaged girls, and the girls who use CHARM are viewed as heroes called "Lilies." Throughout the world, "Garden" military academies are established to train Lilies to face the Huge and to serve as bases to protect and guide people. This is a story about fighting girls who aim to become Lilies at one such Garden.

(Source: Anime News Network)

tags.name: Magic
tags.description: Prominently features magical elements or the use of magic.

tags.name: Primarily Female Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of female characters.

tags.name: Yuri
tags.description: Prominently features romance between two females, not inherently sexual. Also known as Girls' Love.

tags.name: Cute Girls Doing Cute Things
tags.description: Centers around female characters doing cute activities, usually with little to no emphasis on drama and conflict.

tags.name: School
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a primary or secondary educational institution.

tags.name: Swordplay
tags.description: Prominently features the use of swords in combat.

tags.name: Ojou-sama
tags.description: Features a wealthy, high-class, oftentimes stuck up and demanding female character.

tags.name: Ensemble Cast
tags.description: Features a large cast of characters with (almost) equal screen time and importance to the plot.

tags.name: CGI
tags.description: Prominently features scenes created with computer-generated imagery.

tags.name: Tragedy
tags.description: Centers around tragic events and unhappy endings.

tags.name: Memory Manipulation
tags.description: Prominently features a character(s) who has had their memories altered.

node.description:
__[Blog (JP)](http://forte-piano.net/)__ | __[Twitter](https://twitter.com/nijine)__

__Birthplace:__ Osaka Prefecture, Japan
__Residency:__ Tokyo, Japan
__Graduated:__ Nana Prefectural Sakurai Senior High School (2001), Osaka College of Music (2004)

__Introduction:__
Akito Matsuda, also known by his alias Nijine, is a Japanese composer and arranger. He worked freelance as a composer and arranger until his employment with Popholic found place in 2007.

__Biography:__
Akito is mainly known for working under the name Nijine, which he did between 2006 through 2012, where he wrote the soundtracks for a handful of anime while also composing and arranging various anime songs. In 2013, he decided to start using his real name for his work instead. He is also known for working on several eroge soundtracks and vocal songs under the name Tokia (stylized as TOKIA) early on in his career.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/eto_naoki)

Affiliated with EXPLOSION. Formerly affiliated with DIGITAL@SHAFT.

Has a twin brother named [Eiki Etou](https://anilist.co/staff/162905/Eiki-Etou) in the animation industry.

RAISE A SUILEN is an all-girl band in the BanG Dream! franchise. The group consists of five members:
- [Raychell](https://anilist.co/staff/137051/Raychell) (as [LAYER](https://anilist.co/character/136983/Rei-Wakana)) on lead vocals and bass
- [Riko Kohara](https://anilist.co/staff/120173/Riko-Kohara) (as [LOCK](https://anilist.co/character/133744/Rokka-Asahi)) on guitar
- [Natsume](https://anilist.co/staff/137052/Natsume) (as [MASKING](https://anilist.co/character/136984/Masuki-Satou)) on drums
- [Reo Kurachi](https://anilist.co/staff/137053/Reo-Kurachi) (as [PAREO](https://anilist.co/character/136985/Reona-Nyubara)) on keyboard
- [Risa Tsumugi](https://anilist.co/staff/137054/Risa-Tsumugi) (as [CHU²](https://anilist.co/character/136986/Chiyu-Tamade)) as DJ

They were tentatively given the name THE THIRD(仮) before getting their official name. The group was initially formed as a backup band for the vocalists of Afterglow, Pastel*Palettes, and Hello, Happy World! due to them being unable to play their characters' instruments. It was then revealed during the second live that THE THIRD has officially become part of the franchise, along with a new name, RAISE A SUILEN, and a newly recruited member, Risa Tsumugi.
Tou Fuyashi is a collective pseudonym for [Shaft](https://anilist.co/studio/44/)'s staff.

__[Profile](http://www.ariamusic.co.jp/elements-garden/fujita/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/Junpei_Fujita)__

Member of the "music production brand" Elements Garden.
